message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $20,000 for it. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Would you be willing to consider that?
I understand your budget concerns, Bob, but $10,000 is quite a bit lower than what I'm looking for. Could you meet me halfway at $15,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $15,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for the product. Can you consider that?
